definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be sated, satisfied, surfeited (NH (der. spec.) = BH; so As šebû, Ar 4abi9a, Aram [[סְבַע]], sba9, Palm, [[שבע]]; the Eth, vb. of same , meaning is s’agba::);—
be sated (with food), esp. human subj.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: abs. after [[אָכַל]], Ho 4:10, Is 9:19, De 8:10, Ex 16:8 (P), + II t., cf. Is 44:16 (‖[[אָבַל ]]); exposing men to arrogance De 6:11, De 8:12, De 31:20, cf. Ho 13:6, Ho 13:6 (Isr. under fig. of cattle), Je 50:19 (id.; c. [[ב]] loc.; ‖[[רָעָה ]] graze); = have (or get) enough to eat Ps 37:19, Ps 59:16, enough to drink Am 4:8, fig. of sword Je 46:10, of wine Hb Hab 2:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. acc. of food Je 44:17, La 5:16, Ex 16:12 (P), + 6 t., cf. Ez Eze 39:29 (of beasts, in fig.), of earth, sated with water (rain) Pr 30:16, so of trees (acc. om) Ps 104:16, fig. of requital Pr 18:20 b.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: c. [[מִן]] of food Job 19:22 (fig.); fig. of earth having its fill (of rain) Ps 104:13, and (fig. of requital) Pr 18:20; good sense Pr 12:14 (del. [[טוֹב]], so Toy), bad sense Pr 1:31, Pr 14:14; c. [[מִן]] of source Is 66:11 (fig.).
more gen., be sated, have desire satisfied:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: abs. Ez Eze 16:28, Eze 16:29 (i.e. with harlotry), Je 50:10 (with plunder), Is 53:11 (with given result); of eyes Pr 27:20, of Shₑ‘ôl and Abaddōn v20, cf. Pr 30:15; = have abundance Pr 30:9 (exposure to arrogance).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. acc., be satisfied with, have one’s fill of: Je 31:14, cf. Ps 17:15, Ps 63:6, Pr 5:10, Ec 5:9, cf. (eye subj.) Ec 4:8 Acc. of sons Ps 17:14 (si versa l., but text dub., v. Ol Du, cf. Bae We), days of life, i.e. reach the full limit (+ [[זׇקֵן]]) 1Ch 23:1, 2Ch 24:15.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: c. [[ב]] of goodness Ps 65:5, c. [[מִן]] id. Ec 6:3.
have in excess, be surfeited with:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: lit, with honey (acc.) Pr 25:16.

definitions.title: b
definitions.body: fig. = be weary of, c. acc. of offerings Is 1:11 (subj. ´[[י]]:), tossings Job 7:4, poverty Pr 28:19, shame Hb Hab 2:16, contempt Ps 123:3, Ps 123:4 c. acc. pers. Pr 28:17.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: id., c. [[ב]] of troubles Ps 88:4, of reproach La 3:30. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נִשְׂבָּע]] sated Job 31:31. †

definitions.title: Pi
definitions.body: satisfy, Impf. 3mpl. [[יְשַׂבִָּעוּ]] Ez Eze 7:19 they shall  not satisfy their appitite ([[נֶפֶשׁ]]; ‖[[מִלֵּא ]]); Imv ms sf., subj. ´[[י]]:, [[שַׂבְּעֵנִי חַסְדֶָּךָ]] Ps 90:14 (2 acc.). †

definitions.title: 1.a.
definitions.body: satisfy (esp. with material blessings), subj. ´[[י]]:, c. acc. Pers. Je 5:7 (exposing men to arrogance), Is 58:11 (acc.[[נֶפֶשׁ]]; of refreshment in drought, [[ב]] loc., fig. of help and blessing), Ps 107:9 (acc. [[נֶפֶשׁ]] ; ‖[[מִלֵּא ]]), cf. Ps 103:5 ([[ב]] instr., on acc. v. [[עֲדִי]]); c. acc. of ground Job 38:27 (i.e. with rain); human subj., c. acc. [[נֶפֶשׁ]] Is 58:10

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: ´[[י]]: subj., c acc. of beast + [[מִמְּךָ]] (of Pharaoh, in prophetic fig.) Ez Eze 32:4.
enrich subj. Tyre, c. acc. gent. Ez Eze 27:33 (‖[[הֶעֱשִׁיר ]]).
sate, glut (with the undesired), subj. ´[[י]]:, c. acc. pers. + [[ב]] rei La 3:15, acc. pers. + Job 9:18.
